title: Secret Recording Exposes Evil Government Abuse of Special Needs
description: https://worldimages.gallery/images/2018/12/17/9f3f43a6526a5624a1153e50826417e1.png Secret Recording Exposes Evil Government Abuse of Special Needs Children by 3 Teachers 720p - roflcopter2110 [WWRG] West Virginia (RTR Investigative Report) with Call to the West Virginia Attorney General's Office at the end. Smart Mom, Amber Pack sent her 6-year-old daughter to school with an audio recording device in her hair. The girl has severe autism, and, according to her mother, is nonverbal and requires complete care. Pack said she suspected something was wrong. Pack posted part of the eight-hour audio recording to her personalpage. In the recording, an adult in the classroom can be heard telling the child to “shut up.” The adult can also be heard telling the child that she would punch her in the face, withhold food from, and some things to vile to publish here. Christina Lester, June Yurish and Kristin Douty were named as the abusers.... Please share this information far and wide, burn the video to DVDs/Blu-ray discs or put it on USB Flash Drives and give them out to friends, family and others. Please seed as long as possible, at least to a ratio of 1.100, thank you :) General : Secret Recording Exposes Evil Government Abuse of Special Needs Children by 3 Teachers 720p MP4 - roflcopter2110 [WWRG].mp4 Format : MPEG-4 at 1 093 kb/s Length : 116 MiB for 14 min 47 s 490 ms Video #0 : AVC at 957 kb/s Aspect : 1280 x 720 (1.778) at 30.000 fps Audio #0 : AAC at 128 kb/s Infos : 2 channels, 44.1 kHz Screens: https://worldimages.gallery/images/2019/03/04/95fdfefa46e9a3af3a4d9e725e7782b8.png https://worldimages.gallery/images/2019/03/04/85beabf4eb06c998ec4dca1177197e17.gif https://worldimages.gallery/images/2018/12/17/54b480c3768b91a2ad46354c82e5e9e0.gif
